Title: Establishes the home kitchen enterprise and economic opportunity act
Summary: Establishes the home kitchen enterprise and economic opportunity act; relates to the licensing and operation of home kitchen operations which store, handle, prepare and package ready-to-eat food for consumers.
LawCode: Add Art 22-A §§265 - 269, amd §§251-z-2 & 500, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the licensing of home kitchen operations
